properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE REPORT_COUNT > 0 AND IS_BANNED = 'N' AND IS_WHITELIST = 'N'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE REPORT_COUNT > 0 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY JOIN MEMBER ON(REQ_USER = USER_NO)
